product_name: Rossignol Fun Girl J4 Ski Boots - Junior Girls' - 2013/2014
long_description: Rossignol Fun Girl J4 ski boots are designed for girls expanding their skills. They provide a comfortable fit and performance features with lightweight shells that are easy for young skiers to flex. Anatomic inner boots conform to the shape of girls' feet, ensuring all-day comfort. Bi-injected polyolefin shells are lightweight and easy to manage for young skiers. Liners use anatomic, molded foam to increase warmth and comfort. Rossignol Fun Girl J4 ski boots are offered in Mondo sizes 23.5 - 25.5, which correspond to US kids' sizes 5.5 - 7; Mondo sizing is a standardized ski industry sizing system. Rossignol Fun Girl J4 ski boots feature 4 buckles and a high cuff height for older kids with longer legs.
short_description: Rossignol Fun Girl J4 ski boots are designed for girls expanding their skills. They provide a comfortable fit and performance features with lightweight shells that are easy for young skiers to flex.
